gurmukhi: ਰਚਨਾ ਚਰਿਤ੍ਰ ਚਿਤ੍ਰ ਬਿਸਮ ਬਚਿਤ੍ਰਪਨ ਕਾਹੂ ਸੋ ਨ ਕੋੳੂ ਕੀਨੇ ੲੇਕ ਹੀ ਅਨੇਕ ਹੈ
transliteration: Rachanaa Charitr Chitr Bisam Bachitrapana , Kaahoo So N Kooo Keenay Ayk Hee Anayk Hai ?
translation: Miracle of His creation is wondrous and astonishing. No human being has been created like another. Yet His light prevails in all.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਪਟ ਕਪਟ ਘਟ ਘਟ ਨਟ ਵਟ ਨਟ ਗੁਪਤ ਪ੍ਰਗਟ ਅਟਪਟ ਜਾਵਦੇਕ ਹੈ
transliteration: Nipat Kapat Ghat Ghat Nat Vat Nata , Goupat Pragat Atapat Jaavadayk Hai ?
translation: This world is an illusion. But every creation that is part of this entangled illusion, He, Himself is causing these wondrous acts both conspicuously and latently like a juggler.

gurmukhi: ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਸੀ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਨ ਦਰਸਨ ਸੋ ਦਰਸੁ ਬਚਨ ਸੋ ਬਚਨ ਨ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਸਮੇਕ ਹੈ
transliteration: Drisati See Drisati N Darasan So Darasu , Bachan So Bachan N Surati Samayk Hai ?
translation: In this creation, no one looks alike, talks alike, thinks alike or sees alike. No one's wisdom is the same.

gurmukhi: ਰੂਪ ਰੇਖ ਲੇਖ ਭੇਖ ਨਾਦ ਬਾਦ ਨਾਨਾ ਬਿਧਿ ਅਗਮ ਅਗਾਧਿ ਬੋਧ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਬਿਬੇਕ ਹੈ ||੩੪੨||
transliteration: Roop Raykh Laykh Bhaykh Naad Baad Naanaa Bidhi , Agam Agaadhi Bodh Braham Bibayk Hai ?342?
translation: Living beings are of myriad forms, fortune, posture, sound and rhythm. All this is beyond comprehension and knowledge. In fact it is beyond human capability to understand the strange and wondrous creation of the Lord. (342)
